IBoard
public class Board2D
extends Object
implements IBoard

2 dimensional implementation of a TicTacToe board.

Author:
Thomas Low (thomas.low@ovgu.de)

isFinalState

public boolean isFinalState()
Description copied from interface: IBoard
Returns if the board is in a final state. A final state means that either one of the players has won, or all fields are occupied, resulting in a draw.

Specified by:
isFinalState in interface IBoard
Returns:
true if the board is in a final state and can not be modified anymore
